articles.author: David Shepardson, Timothy Gardner
articles.title: Trump taps Big Tech critic Carr to chair Federal Communications Commission - Reuters
articles.description: Brendan Carr, a critic of the Biden administration's telecom policies and Big Tech, is currently the top Republican on the FCC.

articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: No, Apple CEO Tim Cook Didn't Say He Prefers Logitech's MX Master 3 Over the Magic Mouse - MacRumors
articles.description: While the Logitech MX Master 3 is a terrific mouse for the Mac, reports claiming that Apple CEO Tim Cook prefers that mouse over the Magic Mouse are...
articles.content:
While the Logitech MX Master 3 is a terrific mouse for the Mac, reports claiming that Apple CEO Tim Cook prefers that mouse over the Magic Mouse are false.
The Wall Street Journal last month publish… [+954 chars]
